subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which city was the capital of Rajasthan before Jaipur?
question_hi: जैसे बार जापान के राजधानी थी ?
explanation_en: Jodhpur was the capital of Rajasthan before Jaipur. It served as the capital from 1569 until 1818 when Jaipur became the capital.
explanation_hi: जोधपुर राजधानी राजस्थान में 1569 से 1818 तक थी, जबकि जापान केवल 1818 तक राजस्थान के राजधानी बनने वाला था।
explanation: Jodhpur served as the capital of Rajasthan from 1569 to 1818, after which Jaipur became the capital.

subject: Rajasthan History
